metadata.title: CVE-2023-27517 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Improper access control in some Intel(R) Optane(TM) PMem software beforeversions 01.00.00.3547, 02.00.00.3915, 03.00.00.0483 may allow anathenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via localaccess.

criterions.comment: ipmctl package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
